attributes.action: Change the law to allow party members the right to enter party leadership races.
attributes.additional_details: This would give party members more control and raise the bar of competency in leadership positions.
attributes.background: Change the law to allow any party member to run to be leader of their party just like Canada allows.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The rules for leadership elections in political parties are a matter for those parties. The Government and Parliament are therefore not responsible for the issue raised in this petition.
